question.text: Which one of the following phenomena supports Darwin's concept of natural selection in organic evolution?

options.text: Production of 'Dolly', the sheep by cloning
Development of organs from 'stem cells' for organ transplantation

solution.text:
When DDT was sprayed to kill mosquitoes, there were only a few mosquitoes that were already resistant to DDT, and hence survived. Most of the mosquitoes which were sensitive to DDT died.

Due to differential reproduction, the resistant mosquitoes got more chances of reproduction and multiplied. After a few generations, most of the mosquitoes were resistant. The sensitive were very few, This supports Darwin's theory of natural selection and survival of the fittest.
